document_data.name: Cyndra
document_data.mainbody: '''Queen Cyndra''' was a [[windsoul genasi]] and the ruler of [[Akanûl]] in the early years of the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

Relationships.Personal: Cyndra was the daughter of [[Zavon]], and she was also the mother of [[Arathane]], who she bore late in life.{{Cite dragon/377/Explore Airspur|63}}
Relationships.Political: Cyndra was considered a fair and just ruler by her subjects, and was well liked by both the nobility and the commoners of Akanûl.

document_data.History:
Around the {{YearlinkName|1429}}, Cyndra became queen of Akanûl after succeeding her father, the late King Zavon. Cyndra led the survivors of [[Brassune]] to the city of [[Airspur (Chessenta)|Airspur]], displacing its [[orc]] and [[half-orc]] inhabitants, and rebuilding the city into the new home of the displaced [[genasi]]. Cyndra also enacted laws and edicts that gained her the approval and support of the nobility, such as the ''Covenant of Stewardship'' and the office of the [[Four Stewards]]. It was considered that her rule was a renaissance of sorts for the genasi kingdom.

Queen Cyndra died of illness in [[1469 DR]], and was succeeded as queen by her daughter, Arathane.
